text: Liam Payne, 24, and singer Cheryl Cole, 35, are going their separate directions ways. The former One Direction singer and the “ X Factor UK ” judge announced their split on Sunday after nearly two years together. The two have a 1 - year - old son together, Bear. Venturelli via Getty Images Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole attend the Chopard Tropy Ceremony on May 12, 2016 in Cannes. “ We are sad to announce that we are going our separate ways. It ’ s been a tough decision for us to make, ” the joint statement said, which appeared somewhat differently on the pair ’ s respective Twitter accounts. “ We still have so much love for each other as a family.
